titleStmt.title: Of the art both of writing & judging of history with reflections upon ancient as well as modern historians, shewing through what defects there are so few good, and that it is impossible there should be many so much as tolerable / by the Jesuit Father Le-Moyne.
titleStmt.author: Le Moyne, Pierre, 1602-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Sare and J. Hindmarsh,

notesStmt.note: A translation of the author's "De l'histoire."
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
